data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Temotu, Solomon Islands. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Temotu, Solomon Islands
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 6,457 believers in Temotu and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 4 new simple churches in the state of Temotu, Solomon Islands. Place a simple church in every community of the 20,700 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Temotu.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Temotu, Solomon Islands to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Temotu, Solomon Islands.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Temotu.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.
